concept.title: HTTP Protocols
concept.shortdesc: You can configure to use HTTP or HTTPS. By default uses HTTP.

conbody.p: HTTP protocolconfiguring for the Data Collector Data Collectorconfiguring the HTTP protocolHTTPS requires an SSL certificate. provides a self-signed certificate so you can use HTTPS immediately. You can also generate a certificate that is self-signed or signed by a certifying authority. Web browsers generally issue a warning for self-signed certificates.
When you configure to use HTTPS, you can have redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS or to ignore them.
You use different properties to configure HTTPS based on whether you run standalone or cluster pipelines.
